movie.title: Sheep and Wolves: Pig Deal
movie.description_intro: The united town of sheep and wolves lives a peaceful and quiet life until two unexpected guests turn up - a polar fox and a tiny ewe. No one ever expected them to bring a deadly danger, which can be overcome only if they work together. Only teamwork can solve big problems and deal with serious challenges - as there is strength in unity.
movie.description_full: The united town of sheep and wolves lives a peaceful and quiet life until two unexpected guests turn up - a polar fox and a tiny ewe. No one ever expected them to bring a deadly danger, which can be overcome only if they work together. Only teamwork can solve big problems and deal with serious challenges - as there is strength in unity.

movies.title: Return of the Sister Street Fighter
movies.title_english: Return of the Sister Street Fighter
movies.title_long: Return of the Sister Street Fighter (1975)
movies.summary: When the crime boss has to pick one of his thugs for a fight he takes his knife, throws it to the roof and kills a butterfly with it, then the knife falls to one guy's shoulder and that's the man he's chosen for the job. That's some serious inventiveness. And who's the guys he's gonna fight? That's Yasuaki Kurata of course.
movies.description_full: When the crime boss has to pick one of his thugs for a fight he takes his knife, throws it to the roof and kills a butterfly with it, then the knife falls to one guy's shoulder and that's the man he's chosen for the job. That's some serious inventiveness. And who's the guys he's gonna fight? That's Yasuaki Kurata of course.

movies.title: Daibosatsu toge: Kanketsu-hen
movies.summary: Disguised as a beggar monk, Ryunosuke's harrassed along the road by the rowdy members of a country dojo or fencing school malingering outside their fencing hall.
movies.description_full: Disguised as a beggar monk, Ryunosuke's harrassed along the road by the rowdy members of a country dojo or fencing school malingering outside their fencing hall.
movies.synopsis: Disguised as a beggar monk, Ryunosuke's harrassed along the road by the rowdy members of a country dojo or fencing school malingering outside their fencing hall.

movies.title: Cathedrals of Culture
movies.summary: Six directors tackle the question "If buildings could talk, what would they say about us?" by capturing iconic buildings with narration from the perspective of the buildings.
movies.description_full: Six directors tackle the question "If buildings could talk, what would they say about us?" by capturing iconic buildings with narration from the perspective of the buildings.
movies.synopsis: Six directors tackle the question "If buildings could talk, what would they say about us?" by capturing iconic buildings with narration from the perspective of the buildings.

movies.title: Trimurti: Bond of Three
movies.summary: Entrapped by notorious gangster, Khokha Singh; an honest police inspector Satyadevi Singh gets a life sentence in jail. She hopes to get her three sons, Shakti, Anand and Romi to avenge this carnage but the three have all parted ways and due to this separation they develop hatred for each other. They all takes up different jobs and identity in life.

They all takes up different jobs and identity in life.
